name: cryptik
short_description:
Cryptik is a python application for querying various exchanges (btc-e, crypto-trade, kraken, bitcoinaverage, etc.) to get the current price for various cryptocurrencies (bitcoin, litecoin, primecoin, etc.).

Supported Exchanges:
* BTC-E
* Coinbase
* BitCoinAverage
* CryptoTrade
* KRAKEN
* CAVIRTEX
* MTGOX
* VIRCUREX
* BitStamp
* CampBX
* Cryptsy
Supported CryptoCurrencies:
* BTC
* LTC
* FTC
* PPC
* NMC
* XPM
* PPC
* WDC
* UTC
Please submit tickets if there is an exchange and/or currency you would like added.

See the project wiki (https://sourceforge.net/p/cryptik/wiki/Home/) for more information.
